column.name: fk_support
column.remarks: Foreign key of associated support

column.name: usr_azimut_1
column.remarks: Field for custom info; use can be specified with alias in QGIS

column.name: usr_azimut_2
column.remarks: Field for custom info; use can be specified with alias in QGIS

column.name: usr_azimut_3
column.remarks: Field for custom info; use can be specified with alias in QGIS

column.name: _creation_date
column.remarks: Date of creation, automatically filled in within QGIS project

column.name: _creation_user
column.remarks: User of creation, automatically filled in within QGIS project

column.name: _last_modification_date
column.remarks: Date of last modification, automatically filled in within QGIS project

column.name: _last_modification_user
column.remarks: User of last modification, automatically filled in within QGIS project

column.name: offset_x
column.remarks: Sets an offset in X direction of all associated front side signals, to improve visibility on the map

column.name: offset_y
column.remarks: Sets an offset in Y direction of all associated frond side signals, to improve visibility on the map

column.name: offset_x_verso
column.remarks: Sets an offset in X direction of all associated back side signals, to improve visibility on the map

column.name: offset_y_verso
column.remarks: Sets an offset in Y direction of all associated back side signals, to improve visibility on the map

column.name: needs_validation
column.remarks: Automatically set to true if the conditions for control are met

column.name: _last_modification_platform
column.remarks: Platform (mobile, desktop) of last modification, automatically filled in within QGIS project. This field is used as a condition in the control view.

column.name: identification
column.remarks: Name or description of the document

column.name: path
column.remarks: Path to the document

column.name: type
column.remarks: Type (jpg, png, pdf, image, document, etc.)

column.name: fk_document
column.remarks: Foreign key of document; automatically filled in

column.name: object_class
column.remarks: Type of associated object: azimut or support; automatically filled in

column.name: fk_object
column.remarks: Foreign key of associated object (azimut or support); automatically filled in

column.name: fk_azimut
column.remarks: Foreign key of associated azimut

column.name: rank
column.remarks: Ranking (automatically filled in in QGIS) depending on the order of frames for each azimut

column.name: fk_frame_type
column.remarks: Foreign key for frame type value list

column.name: fk_frame_fixing_type
column.remarks: Foreign key for frame fixing type value list

column.name: double_sided
column.remarks: Set true if double sided (default). This has no influence on the symbology of the map

column.name: fk_status
column.remarks: Foreign key of status value list

column.name: fk_provider
column.remarks: Foreign key of provider value list

column.name: dimension_1
column.remarks: If frame is rectangular, height/width; if frame is circular, radius; if frame is elliptic, major/minor radius

column.name: dimension_2
column.remarks: If frame is rectangular, height/width; if frame is circular, not needed; if frame is elliptic, major/minor radius

column.name: fk_mounting_point
column.remarks: Anchor point of frame (left, right, center). Default is center. This value influences the visual representation on the map and is used in support.group_by_mounting_point condition

column.name: fk_frame
column.remarks: Foreign key of associated frame

column.name: rank
column.remarks: Ranking (automatically filled in in QGIS) depending on the order of signs for each frame

column.name: complex
column.remarks: Set true if the sign is too complex for being in the available svg selection. A placeholder sign ("?") will appear on the map, the real sign can be seen on the photo in the form

column.name: fk_sign_type
column.remarks: Foreign key of sign type value list

column.name: fk_official_sign
column.remarks: Foreign key of official sign value list

column.name: fk_marker_type
column.remarks: Foreign key of marker type value list

column.name: fk_mirror_shape
column.remarks: Foreign key of mirror shape value list

column.name: fk_parent
column.remarks: Foreign key of associated parent sign

column.name: fk_owner
column.remarks: Foreign key of owner value list

column.name: fk_provider
column.remarks: Foreign key of provider value list

column.name: fk_durability
column.remarks: Foreign key of durability value list

column.name: fk_status
column.remarks: Foreign key of status value list

column.name: case_id
column.remarks: Identifier of offical autorisation case

column.name: case_decision
column.remarks: Decision of offical autorisation case

column.name: inscription_1
column.remarks: Line 1 for dynamic inscriptions

column.name: inscription_2
column.remarks: Line 2 for dynamic inscriptions

column.name: inscription_3
column.remarks: Line 3 for dynamic inscriptions

column.name: fk_coating
column.remarks: Foreign key of coating value list

column.name: fk_lighting
column.remarks: Foreign key of lighting value list

column.name: mirror_protruding
column.remarks: boolean (default is false)

column.name: mirror_red_frame
column.remarks: boolean (default is false)

column.name: dimension_1
column.remarks: If sign is rectangular, height/width; if sign is circular, radius; if sign is elliptic, major/minor radius

column.name: dimension_2
column.remarks: If sign is rectangular, height/width; if sign is circular, not needed; if sign is elliptic, major/minor radius

column.name: usr_sign_1
column.remarks: Field for custom info; use can be specified with alias in QGIS

column.name: usr_sign_2
column.remarks: Field for custom info; use can be specified with alias in QGIS

column.name: usr_sign_3
column.remarks: Field for custom info; use can be specified with alias in QGIS

column.name: _creation_date
column.remarks: Date of creation, automatically filled in within QGIS project

column.name: _creation_user
column.remarks: User of creation, automatically filled in within QGIS project

column.name: _last_modification_date
column.remarks: Date of last modification, automatically filled in within QGIS project

column.name: _last_modification_user
column.remarks: User of last modification, automatically filled in within QGIS project

column.name: fk_user_sign
column.remarks: Foreign key of user sign value list

column.name: natural_direction_or_left
column.remarks: Determines the direction for directional signs, with reference to frame.anchor. Default is true

column.name: fk_hanging_mode
column.remarks: Defines whether a panel carries the same signal on both sides; influences the symbology on the map. Default is recto (only front side)

column.name: needs_validation
column.remarks: Automatically set to true if the conditions for control are met

column.name: _last_modification_platform
column.remarks: Platform (mobile, desktop) of last modification, automatically filled in within QGIS project. This field is used as a condition in the control view.

column.name: fk_support_type
column.remarks: Foreign key of support type value list

column.name: fk_owner
column.remarks: Foreign key of owner value list

column.name: fk_provider
column.remarks: Foreign key of provider value list

column.name: fk_support_base_type
column.remarks: Foreign key of support base type value list

column.name: road_segment
column.remarks: Optional field to reference a road

column.name: height
column.remarks: Support height

column.name: height_free_under_signal
column.remarks: Free height under signals

column.name: fk_status
column.remarks: Foreign key of status value list

column.name: usr_support_1
column.remarks: Field for custom info; use can be specified with alias in QGIS

column.name: usr_support_2
column.remarks: Field for custom info; use can be specified with alias in QGIS

column.name: usr_support_3
column.remarks: Field for custom info; use can be specified with alias in QGIS

column.name: _creation_date
column.remarks: Date of creation, automatically filled in within QGIS project

column.name: _creation_user
column.remarks: User of creation, automatically filled in within QGIS project

column.name: _last_modification_date
column.remarks: Date of last modification, automatically filled in within QGIS project

column.name: _last_modification_user
column.remarks: User of last modification, automatically filled in within QGIS project

column.name: group_by_mounting_point
column.remarks: Set true to visually order signals by their anchor point (within each azimut), set false if ranking order should be respected

column.name: needs_validation
column.remarks: Automatically set to true if the conditions for control are met

column.name: _last_modification_platform
column.remarks: Platform (mobile, desktop) of last modification, automatically filled in within QGIS project. This field is used as a condition in the control view.

column.name: fk_support_tube_type
column.remarks: Foreign key of tube type value list

column.name: active
column.remarks: Set to false if sign should not appear in the selection anymore. Default is true

column.name: img_de
column.remarks: Path to svg (if directional, this is the left direction). Idem for img_fr, img_it, img_ro

column.name: img_height
column.remarks: Height of the svg. If 0, it will not appear on the map. Ratio width-height has to be respected

column.name: img_width
column.remarks: Width of the svg. If 0, it will not appear on the map. Ratio width-height has to be respected

column.name: no_dynamic_inscription
column.remarks: Number of dynamic inscriptions. Default is 0

column.name: directional_sign
column.remarks: Boolean if sign is directional. Default is false

column.name: img_de_right
column.remarks: Path to svg (if directional, this is the right direction). Idem for img_fr_right, img_it_right, img_ro_right

checkConstraint.constraint: (((directional_sign IS FALSE) OR ((img_de_right IS NOT NULL) AND (img_fr_right IS NOT NULL) AND (img_it_right IS NOT NULL) AND (img_ro_right IS NOT NULL))))
checkConstraint.name: directional

column.name: img_height
column.remarks: Height of the svg. If 0, it will not appear on the map. Ratio width-height has to be respected

column.name: img_width
column.remarks: Width of the svg. If 0, it will not appear on the map. Ratio width-height has to be respected

column.name: no_dynamic_inscription
column.remarks: Number of dynamic inscriptions. Default is 0

column.name: directional_sign
column.remarks: Boolean if sign is directional. Default is false

column.name: img_de_right
column.remarks: Path to svg (if directional, this is the right direction). Idem for img_fr_right, img_it_right, img_ro_right

checkConstraint.constraint: (((directional_sign IS FALSE) OR ((img_de_right IS NOT NULL) AND (img_fr_right IS NOT NULL) AND (img_it_right IS NOT NULL) AND (img_ro_right IS NOT NULL))))
checkConstraint.name: directional
